Class GenericMenuElement

java.lang.Object
menu.GenericMenuElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericMenuElementInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, TextMenuElement
public class GenericMenuElement extends Object implements GenericMenuElementInterface
Abstract class that serves as parent to all the elements present on menu's
